channel.title: 2 Quick Questions
channel.description:
Just wondering if these are possible...
1. Is it possible to change the walk speed? At the moment you move 1 square. Is it possible to change it so, for example, it moves 2 squares? Or even 5 squares? At a time. I mean, it jumps squares. Making you walk a little faster is what I wanted to get to.
And
2. Is it possible to change fatigue so it burns faster? At the moment, when you kill an npc, you get +2 fatigue. one for the strength xp, and the second for hit points xp (training aggressive). Could it be changed so you it gains +2 fatigue each?
Thanks in advance guys :)

item.title: 2 Quick Questions
item.dc:creator: @yong_min yong min
item.description:
@yong_min wrote:

I guess speeding up the movement speed would require new sprites too.

Read full topic
